item.woodencog.fireclay_crucible.tooltip: Stackable container holding 1 ingot of fluid
woodencog.ponder.heat.text_1: An item capable of receiving heat will be heated by lava, the maximum temperature is 1700°.
woodencog.ponder.heat.text_2: It's the same with fire, but the temperature limit is 200°. Perfect for cooking !
woodencog.ponder.cool.text_1: Heated item can be cooled down with water.
